Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.dynamodb.util

[Java] Class DelayAfterWriteDynamoDBTemplateDecorator

    • org.grails.datastore.mapping.dynamodb.util.DelayAfterWriteDynamoDBTemplateDecorator
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      DynamoDBTemplate

      public class DelayAfterWriteDynamoDBTemplateDecorator
extends java.lang.Object

      Simple decorator used in testing to fight eventual consistency of DynamoDB.
